newsitem.title: USA: Cyberonics files to register 3 mln shrs.
newsitem.headline: Cyberonics files to register 3 mln shrs.

text.p: Cyberonics Inc filed Friday with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to register an offering of up to three million common shares.
Underwriters for the offering, Montgomery Securities and Piper Jaffray Inc, have an over-allotment option of up to 450,000 shares.
The Webster, Texas, medical device designer said it will use the proceeds from the sale to fund sales and marketing of its products, clinical trials and other general corporate needs.
Last month, the company said it received the U.S. Food and Drug Administration's approval to market its NeuroCybernetic Prosthesis System, a device used to treat epilepsy.
After the offering, the company will have 16,322,175 common shares outstanding.
